name: Warfare (itch) (Adam Burt)
description:
I initially started creating this for Global Game Jam 2023, but parked it in favour of completing another project which was more 'on theme'. I then decided to revisit this after the deadline and finish it off. It's built mostly under game jam conditions, but obviously has had a little longer in the oven. Made with Twine.

Audio Credits

Featuring: Japan Sky - by Kjartan Abel.
Visit https://kjartan-abel.com/library to find free music for your next project.
Japan Sky is licensed under the following: CC BY-SA 4.0 Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International. 

Additional ambient audio courtesy of Starscade.
